creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; two standing women wearing green dresses--woman at left wears knee-length dress and green hat, woman at right wearing long gown; blue in URC; text at right edge: "ELASTIC / FABRIC / BY / SILVANO / OF / ROMA"
medium: Pencil, crayon and pastel on board
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016
title: Elastic Fabric by Silvano of Roma
